ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup Quaker® Oats (Quick or Old Fashioned, uncooked)
½ cup non-fat plain Greek yogurt
1 cup fresh mixed berries and fruit

cookingTips: Layer oats, milk, and yogurt evenly for consistent texture throughout
Prepare the night before for grab-and-go breakfast convenience
Add fresh berries just before eating to prevent sogginess and preserve texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can I customize overnight oats with different flavors and textures while keeping them healthy?
